name: Lychee Linux
short_description:
The more affordable approach to great Support. Inexpensive, reliable, and prepared!

Our distribution has gone through a big evolution over the years. First it has been a distribution specialized on the needs of developers but over the years we saw that every business relies on great teamwork and collaboration also on the computer. This is why we specialized on local network collaboration for business use.

In order to offer a stable and business use qualified distribution we offer a charged support. This means every business which needs a business class support can have it by the developers itself. We of course offer licensation for consulting companies in order to give our customers the choice where to get support maybe at you local consulting company which you already know or you even have your own administration licensed by us. Everything is possible!

Login!
You need to login with username: dev and password: linux
